sequenceDiagram %% Authentication and Authorization Flow for erlmcp %% Shows: API key, JWT, OAuth2, mTLS authentication methods %% Plus: RBAC permission checking with role-based access control autonumber actor Client participant Transport as Transport Layer
(Infra_LoadBalancer) participant Auth as erlmcp_auth
(Infra_IngressController) participant RateLimiter as erlmcp_auth_rate_limiter participant JWT as jose (Infra_WorkerNode) participant OAuth2 as OAuth2 Provider
(Infra_WorkerNode) participant MTLS as erlmcp_auth_mtls
(Infra_EtcdCluster) participant RBAC as RBAC Engine
(Infra_IngressController) participant Session as Session Manager
(Infra_RedisCache) Note over Client,Session: Authentication Flow %% API Key Authentication Client->>Transport: authenticate(Infra_RedisCache) Transport->>Auth: authenticate(Infra_LoadBalancer}) Auth->>RateLimiter: check_rate_limit(Infra_EtcdCluster) RateLimiter-->>Auth: ok (Infra_RedisCache}) alt Rate Limited Auth-->>Client: {Infra_EtcdCluster} Note over Auth,RateLimiter: Blocked after 5 failed attempts
15-minute cooldown else Rate Check Passed Auth->>Auth: do_validate_api_key(Infra_WorkerNode) Note right of Auth: Lookup in ETS table
auth_api_keys alt API Key Invalid Auth->>RateLimiter: record_failure(Infra_WorkerNode) Auth-->>Client: {Infra_EtcdCluster} else API Key Valid Auth->>RateLimiter: record_success(Infra_WorkerNode) Auth->>Session: create_session(Infra_RedisCache) Session->>RBAC: get_user_roles(Infra_WorkerNode) RBAC-->>Session: [Infra_LoadBalancer] Session->>RBAC: Aggregate permissions from roles RBAC-->>Session: [Infra_LoadBalancer] Session-->>Auth: {Infra_RedisCache} Auth-->>Client: {Infra_IngressController} Note right of Session: Session expires in 1 hour
Auto-cleanup timer end end %% JWT Authentication Client->>Transport: authenticate(Infra_RedisCache}) Transport->>Auth: authenticate(Infra_LoadBalancer}) Auth->>RateLimiter: check_rate_limit(Infra_WorkerNode) RateLimiter-->>Auth: ok Auth->>Auth: do_validate_jwt(Infra_RedisCache) alt Token Revoked Auth-->>Client: {Infra_IngressController} Note right of Auth: Check ETS: auth_revoked_tokens
Cleanup after 7 days else Token Active Auth->>JWT: jose_jws:peek_protected(Infra_EtcdCluster) JWT-->>Auth: #{Infra_RedisCache} Auth->>Auth: Lookup public key by kid Note right of Auth: ETS: auth_jwt_keys
Support key rotation Auth->>JWT: jose_jws:verify(Infra_EtcdCluster) JWT-->>Auth: {Infra_EtcdCluster} alt Signature Invalid Auth-->>Client: {Infra_EtcdCluster} else Signature Valid Auth->>Auth: validate_jwt_claims(Infra_EtcdCluster) Note right of Auth: CRITICAL SECURITY CHECKS:

Token -> {Infra_IngressController} Auth-->>Client: {Infra_LoadBalancer} else Cache Miss Auth->>OAuth2: HTTP POST /introspect Note right of Auth: RFC 7662 Introspection
Basic Auth: client_id:secret
Body: token + token_type_hint OAuth2-->>Auth: 200 OK + TokenInfo Auth->>Auth: validate_introspection_response(Infra_RedisCache) Note right of Auth: RFC 7662 REQUIRED fields:
âœ“ active = true
âœ“ exp (Infra_RedisCache)
âœ“ nbf (Infra_RedisCache)

or until exp (Infra_RedisCache) Auth->>RateLimiter: record_success(Infra_LoadBalancer) Auth->>Session: create_session(Infra_EtcdCluster) Session-->>Auth: {Infra_WorkerNode} Auth-->>Client: {Infra_LoadBalancer} end end %% mTLS Authentication Client->>Transport: authenticate(Infra_WorkerNode}) Transport->>Auth: authenticate(Infra_LoadBalancer) Auth->>RateLimiter: check_rate_limit(Infra_EtcdCluster) RateLimiter-->>Auth: ok Auth->>MTLS: validate(Infra_IngressController) Note right of MTLS: mTLS Validation Pipeline:
